question:
Which of the following are the functions of Wetlands?
1) Water purification
2) Control rate of runoff in urban areas
3) Source of livelihood to local people
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation:
Some of the functions of the Wetlands are:
1) Habitat to aquatic flora and fauna, as well as numerous species of birds, including migratory species.
2) Water purification
3) Control rate of runoff in urban areas
4) Source of livelihood to local people
